nodes.bodyText: We'll need to sort out all CQs for this PR
No more CQs :D as long as the license is ok.
We should add JavaDoc comments for these classes. And also enable checkstyle plugin for the module. Although I'd be in favor of relaxing some of the rules regarding the JavaDoc comments.
nodes.diffHunk:

nodes.bodyText: I would like to avoid that. First of all, that would introduce a dependency on the higher level stuff, to this lower level module. Also would the other fields (status, cache directive) have no meaning on this level.
